name: shockingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is offensive, upsetting, or immoral: Stories of abused and battered children are shockingly familiar.
UK informal in a way that is extremely bad or unpleasant, or of very low quality: The service was shockingly bad. They charge shockingly high prices.
